core:process.core:comment: Process to form the body of most Gift Card Issue functions, including Issue or TopUp Gift Card, Sell Gift Card Product, Issue Gift Card as Reward.

core:assignAction.core:comment: Sets properties on the gift card basket item. TODO more to do here...
Sets properties on the gift card basket item. TODO more to do here...
Set the value into the unit price field cos the processor will update the value from this.

core:executeProcessAction.core:comment: This is a VALIDATE request only - actual update willl be performed from end transaction

core:outcomeLink.core:comment: Go to validate amounts if the price was manually entered

core:assignAction.core:comment: Record the product Id for a gift card product sale

core:outcomeLink.core:comment: The embedde price if any will be supplied as gift card value

core:executeProcessAction.core:comment: This process tests for the privileges defined in the definition. If the current user does not have the privileges required then an authorising user is prompted for.

core:state.core:comment: Get value in various ways depending on how the gift card is being sold. From supplied input value if issued as reward, from product price if sold as a product, or by prompting for normal issue or topup.

core:eventLink.core:comment: If selling a gift card product

core:promptState.core:comment: Authorisation Declined. Outcome may give the reason.

core:messageState.core:comment: Validation failed, but sale offline is allowed, so allow continue.
Validation failed, sale offline is not allowed. We could continue on the grounds that the server may come back before we get to the end of the transaction, but for now we'll just fail.
New card was authorised but is already issued. Continue only if user has authorisation.
